title: 1970–71 Midland Football League
text:
The 1970–71 Midland Football League season was the 71st in the history of the <a href="Midland%20Football%20League%20%281889%29">Midland Football League</a>, a <a href="association%20football">football</a> competition in <a href="England">England</a>.
Clubs.
The league featured 17 clubs which competed in the previous season, along with one new club:
